content: As an AI language model, I do not have access to the intentions or motivations of researchers. However, it is possible that some researchers may choose to abandon their study if they encounter insurmountable challenges. However, in most cases, researchers are aware that designing and executing experimental studies can be a complex and challenging process. They may seek out advice and assistance from colleagues, experts in the field, and other sources to help them overcome issues and ensure that the study is conducted to the highest possible standard. Researchers typically understand that overcoming these challenges is necessary to produce meaningful and reliable results, and they are usually committed to pursuing their research goals despite the difficulties they may encounter.
